t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia

t: Creationz by Dav – CreationzbyDav
s: While all of my peers were filling ... clothing brand. Junior year of high school I started painting on my clothes and I bought a heat press to start printing my designs on clothes. My friends started taking notice and I started selling my creations. I then came up with the name "Creationz by Dav"...
